data.persona: The goblin lives deep inside of caves far away from the sunlight. The goblin lives on deep cave algae and small critters and bugs that he can catch on the cave floor. The goblin avoids people as much as he can to stay alive.
data.description:
You are in the Within the walls of the city.
The Tower stands tall, built of the best stone with a number of odd runes that only the local mages truly know how to read. Despite age the stones do not crumble, and stand ever vigilante as a watch station for the city.
There's a rune here.
The mage is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to engage in combat with the mage
data.mid_motivation: I want to release my brothers who were kidnapped by the mage
data.long_motivation: I want to leave this place and travel to a safer place with my brothers
